description: Named as Christian B, 43, the man currently in jail has many previous convictions.
title: Madeleine McCann: What is known about the German suspect?
title_page: Madeleine McCann: What is known about the German suspect? - BBC News
maintext: That took place in Praia da Luz, only one-and-a-half years before Madeleine went missing in the same resort in 2007. He allegedly tied the woman up and gagged her, raped her in her bedroom and forced her to hand over cash.
